Character encodings(ao): ANSI  OEM  EBCDIC  ASCII  Mac  Unix  UTF-8
support of these formats: ANSI  UNICODE  OEM  UTF-8/UTF-16  EBCDIC  ASCII
ASCII  ISO-8859  DOS (OEM)  UTF-8  UTF-16  partial EBCDIC (compilation required)  unicode
File structure view: <ref>Vim has a popular NERDTree for this</ref>
Find in files: <ref>Vim has a popular TagList plug-in that provides a function list.</ref>
